about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a psychological horror story set in the rich and mysterious fantasy worlds of Túatha.

Túatha Echoes: The Village is the first story in the Echoes series, introducing the unique setting of Túatha inspired by pre-Celtic mythology and lore. This short visual novel invites you to uncover the grim fate of a small forest village, where something dark has taken root.

As the first Echo in a series of stories, The Village sets the stage for a magical world steeped in ancient lore. With beautifully illustrated scenes and a dark chilling narrative, this visual novel offers a glimpse into the legends and characters that will shape the future of the Túatha universe.

Explore the dark depths of a world filled with magic and mystery and join us as we forge a new fantasy.

Tuatha Echoes: The Village 

Key Features:

  • Simple Linear Story: Enjoy a simple linear narrative experience.

  • Rich Worldbuilding: Delve into the lore of Túatha, uncovering dark secrets that hint at deeper mysteries yet to be explored.

  • Psychological Horror: Experience the slow descent into madness through atmospheric visuals and immersive sound design.

Lose yourself in Túatha Echoes: The Village.

content_descriptors.notes: A horror setting dealing with Eldrich/Lovecraft-like psychological horror including wide-scale torment and death with suggestions of physical and psychological torture and gruesome murders in the story text but *not* in images.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX12 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in the psychological horror of The Village, where whispers bend reality and ordinary life spirals into madness. Unravel the dark rise of one of Túatha's most infamous figures in this interactive visual novel.
